title: NDTV Exclusive: Jamaican PM On Why Global South Wants India To Represent It
content: India has become the voice of the Global South in a strategic and robust way, and the world saw that in the most-recent G20 Summit which happened in New Delhi, said Jamaican Prime Minister Andrew Holness in an exclusive interview to NDTV.
summary: India has become the voice of the Global South in a strategic and robust way, and the world saw that in the most-recent G20 Summit which happened in New Delhi, said Jamaican Prime Minister Andrew Holness in an exclusive interview to NDTV.

title: "Discussing" Possible Israel Strikes On Iran Oil Facilities, Says Biden
content: Biden told reporters at the White House however that he was not expecting Israel to launch any retaliation for Tehran's missile barrage on Israel before Thursday at least.
summary: Biden told reporters at the White House however that he was not expecting Israel to launch any retaliation for Tehran's missile barrage on Israel before Thursday at least.

title: MPs Can Cross Vote On Major Issues, Rules Pakistan Supreme Court
content: Pakistan's Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that lawmakers can vote separately from their parties on major issues, allowing parliamentary horse-trading as the government tries to rally support for constitutional reform.
summary: Pakistan's Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that lawmakers can vote separately from their parties on major issues, allowing parliamentary horse-trading as the government tries to rally support for constitutional reform.

title: Israeli Fire Killed Over 40 Rescuers, Firefighters In 3 Days: Lebanon
content: Lebanon's health minister said Thursday more than 40 rescuers and firefighters were killed by Israeli fire in three days, with 97 killed overall since Hezbollah and Israel began clashing last October.
summary: Lebanon's health minister said Thursday more than 40 rescuers and firefighters were killed by Israeli fire in three days, with 97 killed overall since Hezbollah and Israel began clashing last October.

title: Iran May Have Had Role In Israeli Embassy Attacks: Swedish Security Service
content: The Swedish intelligence agency Sapo said Thursday that Iran may have been involved in explosions and gunfire around Israeli embassies in Sweden and Denmark this week.
summary: The Swedish intelligence agency Sapo said Thursday that Iran may have been involved in explosions and gunfire around Israeli embassies in Sweden and Denmark this week.

title: In Historic Move, UK Gives Up Sovereignty Of Chagos Islands To Mauritius
content: Britain today said it will give up sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius, but will keep its strategic joint military base with the US in Diego Garcia.
summary: Britain today said it will give up sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius, but will keep its strategic joint military base with the US in Diego Garcia.

title: Indonesian Women Trapped In  'Pleasure Marriages' With Tourists For Money
content: Young women from poor backgrounds in Indonesia are entering into short-term marriages with male tourists, primarily from the Middle East, in exchange for money.
summary: Young women from poor backgrounds in Indonesia are entering into short-term marriages with male tourists, primarily from the Middle East, in exchange for money.

title: Opinion: Israel And Iran Are Now Stuck In Their Own Zero-Sum Game
content: The heart of the matter is that Iran - along with its proxies and Israel - has taken a maximalist position on the negotiating table. This makes it far more difficult to arrive at a negotiated settlement.
summary: The heart of the matter is that Iran - along with its proxies and Israel - has taken a maximalist position on the negotiating table. This makes it far more difficult to arrive at a negotiated settlement.

title: "Enemy Aircraft Launched 3 Strikes": Fresh Israel Raids In South Beirut
content: Lebanon's state-run media said three Israeli air strikes hit Hezbollah's south Beirut stronghold on Thursday, the latest raids following a night of intense bombardment.
summary: Lebanon's state-run media said three Israeli air strikes hit Hezbollah's south Beirut stronghold on Thursday, the latest raids following a night of intense bombardment.

title: As Lebanon Conflict Rages, Gaza And A Ceasefire Slip Out Of Focus
content: Palestinians fear the crisis in Lebanon is diverting the world's attention from Gaza, where Israeli strikes killed dozens more people this week, and diminishing already dim prospects for a ceasefire a year into a war that has shattered the enclave.
summary: Palestinians fear the crisis in Lebanon is diverting the world's attention from Gaza, where Israeli strikes killed dozens more people this week, and diminishing already dim prospects for a ceasefire a year into a war that has shattered the enclave.

title: Massive Sinkhole In Lahore Swallows 3 Vehicles, Causes Traffic Disruptions
content: Pictures and videos of the incident have gone viral on social media, showing locals helping the trapped commuters.
summary: Pictures and videos of the incident have gone viral on social media, showing locals helping the trapped commuters.

title: US Teen Arrested For Filming Women In Mall Restroom Using Hidden Camera
content: Andy Cardenas, the teenager, has been charged with invasion of privacy for placing a hidden camera in a mall restroom
summary: Andy Cardenas, the teenager, has been charged with invasion of privacy for placing a hidden camera in a mall restroom

title: "Pain Doesn't Subside": Israeli Man Who Lost Wife, Son In October 7 Attack
content: Avida Bachar runs his hands across the steel surface of a door that is pierced with bullet holes and is still stained by his son Carmel's
summary: Avida Bachar runs his hands across the steel surface of a door that is pierced with bullet holes and is still stained by his son Carmel's

title: Bank Of America Customers See Zero Balance In Their Accounts. What Happened
content: Some users who managed to access their accounts found their balances displayed as $0, sparking widespread alarm and concern.
summary: Some users who managed to access their accounts found their balances displayed as $0, sparking widespread alarm and concern.

title: Israel Says Hamas Government Chief, 2 Top Leaders Eliminated In Gaza
content: The Israeli military on Thursday said a strike three months ago killed three senior Hamas leaders in Gaza, where the army has been battling the Palestinian operatives for nearly a year.
summary: The Israeli military on Thursday said a strike three months ago killed three senior Hamas leaders in Gaza, where the army has been battling the Palestinian operatives for nearly a year.

title: Georgia Signs Into New Law Bill Despite Warnings, EU Thinks Its Queerphobic
content: The speaker of Georgia's parliament on Thursday signed into law a bill similar to Russian legislation that curbs the rights of LGBTQ people, despite warnings from the EU.
summary: The speaker of Georgia's parliament on Thursday signed into law a bill similar to Russian legislation that curbs the rights of LGBTQ people, despite warnings from the EU.

title: Japan's New PM To Introduce Happiness Index In First Parliamentary Speech
content: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will propose a new happiness index during his first parliamentary policy speech on Friday, local media have reported.
summary: Japan's Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba will propose a new happiness index during his first parliamentary policy speech on Friday, local media have reported.

title: Musk Secretly Funded Right-Wing Group Long Before Trump Endorsement: Sources
content: Elon Musk secretly funded a conservative political group in recent years, according to four people familiar with his donations.
summary: Elon Musk secretly funded a conservative political group in recent years, according to four people familiar with his donations.

title: Annular Solar Eclipse's 'Ring of Fire' Seen In Easter Island And Patagonia
content: The moon blotted out most of the sun across the Pacific Ocean on Wednesday afternoon, giving just a few specks of land an impressive annular "ring of fire" eclipse.
summary: The moon blotted out most of the sun across the Pacific Ocean on Wednesday afternoon, giving just a few specks of land an impressive annular "ring of fire" eclipse.

title: "You Will Never Be My President": Indian User's Reply to Trump Goes Viral
content: A month ahead of the US election, with campaigning at a peak, former President Donald Trump's automated messages have sparked a viral reaction with an Indian user receiving an update today.
summary: A month ahead of the US election, with campaigning at a peak, former President Donald Trump's automated messages have sparked a viral reaction with an Indian user receiving an update today.
